title.native: おおきく振りかぶって　〜夏の大会編〜

description:
Picking up where the original series left off, Ren Mihashi, the ace pitcher of the newly-formed Nishiura High School baseball team, and his teammates face the Sakitama High School team in the next round of the High School Baseball Invitational Tournament as they aim to play in the finals at legendary Hanshin Koushien Stadium.

(Source: Anime News Network)

node.description:
Yousuke Kuroda is a Japanese screenwriter. He is affiliated with Studio Orphee and serves as the inside director (board of directors member).

Kuroda is a prolific writer in the anime industry. Having authored and scripted numerous anime series. Including several original productions. Some of the most notable are Infinite Ryvius, Scryed, Please☆Teacher!, Mobile Suit Gundam 00, and Waiting in the Summer.

In 2003, he won the Individual Award at the 8th Animation Kobe event.
A Japanese manga artist born in Saitama.
__Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.

[Website](https://www.galileogalilei.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/galileo_news) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/galileogalileiphoto/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/galileogalileiofficial) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/galileogalileiSMEJ)

Galileo Galilei is a Japanese four-piece rock band who were initially active between 2007 to 2016, however they made a return in 2022 and have since resumed band activities. They are signed to independent record label Ouchi Daisuki Club Records (2022–), but were signed to SME Records (2007–2016). 

At their first Nippon Budokan performance held on October 11, 2016 it was announced that they would retire. After the band retired, Yuuki Ozaki, Kazuki Ozaki and Hitoshi Sakou continued in a new band named [BBHF](https://anilist.co/staff/174061).

The band announced a return on October 11, 2022 at the warbear's "re:bear" live concert after an exact 6 years hiatus. Upon returning their lineup consisted of two of the original members Yuuki Ozaki and Kazuki Ozaki, accompanied by Fumito Iwai and Masaki Okazaki. Their first album release after returning was Bee And The Whales on May 31st, 2023.

On August 30, 2023 they had a special collaboration with [Porter Robinson](https://anilist.co/staff/120603/Porter-Robinson) with a new take on the song "[Circle Game -ANOHANA Ver.-](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H6CE9uJwH8U)". The original version of the song first appeared in the movie adaption of the anime _[Anohana the Movie: The Flower We Saw That Day](https://anilist.co/anime/15039/Ano-Hi-Mita-Hana-no-Namae-wo-Bokutachi-wa-Mada-Shiranai-Movie/)_.

__Members:__
- [Yuuki Ozaki](https://anilist.co/staff/149245/Yuuki-Ozaki) (尾崎雄貴) – vocalist, guitarist, synthesizer, programmer, in-charge of lyrics and composition (2007–2016, 2022–)
- Kazuki Ozaki (尾崎和樹) – drummer, guitarist, percussionist, rhythm machine, synthesizer, programmer (2007–2016, 2022–)
- Fumito Iwai (岩井郁人) – guitarist, bassist, chorus, synthesizer, programmer (2009–2012, 2022–)
- Masaki Okazaki (岡崎真輝) – bassist (2022–)

__Former Members:__
- Hitoshi Sakou (佐孝仁司) – bassist, guitarist, synthesizer, programmer (2007–2016)
- Souhei Funaya (船谷創平) – guitarist (2007–2009)
- Kazumasa Noguchi (野口一雅) – pianist, organist, bassist, percussionist, synthesizer (2011–2012)

[Website](https://www.galileogalilei.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/galileo_news) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/galileogalileiphoto/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/galileogalileiofficial) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/galileogalileiSMEJ)

Galileo Galilei is a Japanese four-piece rock band who were initially active between 2007 to 2016, however they made a return in 2022 and have since resumed band activities. They are signed to independent record label Ouchi Daisuki Club Records (2022–), but were signed to SME Records (2007–2016). 

At their first Nippon Budokan performance held on October 11, 2016 it was announced that they would retire. After the band retired, Yuuki Ozaki, Kazuki Ozaki and Hitoshi Sakou continued in a new band named [BBHF](https://anilist.co/staff/174061).

The band announced a return on October 11, 2022 at the warbear's "re:bear" live concert after an exact 6 years hiatus. Upon returning their lineup consisted of two of the original members Yuuki Ozaki and Kazuki Ozaki, accompanied by Fumito Iwai and Masaki Okazaki. Their first album release after returning was Bee And The Whales on May 31st, 2023.

On August 30, 2023 they had a special collaboration with [Porter Robinson](https://anilist.co/staff/120603/Porter-Robinson) with a new take on the song "[Circle Game -ANOHANA Ver.-](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H6CE9uJwH8U)". __Members:__
- [Yuuki Ozaki](https://anilist.co/staff/149245/Yuuki-Ozaki) (尾崎雄貴) – vocalist, guitarist, synthesizer, programmer, in-charge of lyrics and composition (2007–2016, 2022–)
- Kazuki Ozaki (尾崎和樹) – drummer, guitarist, percussionist, rhythm machine, synthesizer, programmer (2007–2016, 2022–)
- Fumito Iwai (岩井郁人) – guitarist, bassist, chorus, synthesizer, programmer (2009–2012, 2022–)
- Masaki Okazaki (岡崎真輝) – bassist (2022–)

Hiroo Maruyama is a producer working for Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS).

He joined Mainichi Broadcasting in 1999. Was transferred later to the Tokyo office and took over duties relating to the production of animation broadcasts. He was responsible for production on series like Gundam Seed, Gundam Seed Destiny and Full Metal Alchemist, all part of the 6:00pm Saturday timeblock, which gained wide popularity.
Kouichirou Natsume is representative director & president of Aniplex company.
**Murakami Masayuki (村上仁之)** is a Japanese producer and animation planner.
An animation producer. Not to be confused with the [mangaka](https://anilist.co/staff/147824).

Kozue Kananiwa graduated from the HOSEI University of Tokyo, Faculty of Letters, Department of Japan Literature. Her first work as a producer was for [Oh! My Goddess](https://anilist.co/anime/50/Aa-Megamisama-TV/) in 2005.

Since, she participated in the production many renown series such as [Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica](https://anilist.co/anime/9756/Mahou-Shoujo-MadokaMagica/) in 2011, [Steins;Gate](https://anilist.co/anime/9253/SteinsGate) the same year, or more recently [Horimiya](https://anilist.co/anime/124080/Horimiya/).

Now, she is the General Manager of  both U-NEXT Anime & Book Division and of the Production Department.

(Source : Bangumi 番組計画RC3)
**Tomonori Ochikoshi** is a Japanese producer. He is affiliated with studio A-1 Pictures.
__Naohiro Tafu__ is a Japanese producer and animation planner. He currently works for the company Movic.
